recipes.title: GARLIC SHRIMP ZOODLES
recipes.author: Master Chef
recipes.content: Another low-carb zoodle recipe, this time with sweet and tasty garlic roasted shrimp. Lemon adds a bit of tanginess and freshness to the zucchini noodles.

recipes.title: PARMESAN CRUSTED CHICKEN
recipes.author: THE CHEF
recipes.content: This is a simple recipe for a parmesan crusted chicken. It's a great way to make a quick meal for your family.

recipes.title: CHICKEN POTATOES
recipes.author: THE CHEF
recipes.content: Well, this quick emergency fish recipe is perfect with any fish fillet you have. Itâ€™s a super-healthy fish recipe ready in no time with a delicious golden baked crust.

recipes.title: FARMER'S MARKET SPICY TUNA WRAPS
recipes.author: THE CHEF
recipes.content: These tuna wraps are just delicious. Full of fresh veggies and drizzled with light chipotle Greek yogurt ranch dressing.

recipes.title: HONEY GARLIC SALMON
recipes.author: THE CHEF
recipes.content: I have for you some incredibly good-for-you yet yummy recipes that everyone in your family will love. All these dinner recipes are easy to prepare and are made with whole ingredients. They are filling and nutritious, perfect as your last meal of the day.
